description:
Baizhi is a researcher in Remnant Ecoacoustics.
Baizhi's once unfulfilled wish has now manifested as her loyal companion. The Remnant Creature You'tan is her source of healing powers, and a lifelong research focus.

descriptionLocalized.vi: Bạch Chỉ là một nhà nghiên cứu tại Viện Sinh thái học Remnant.Ước mơ dang dở của Bạch Chỉ giờ đây đã trở thành người bạn đồng hành trung thành của cô. Sinh vật Remnant You'tan là nguồn gốc của sức mạnh chữa bệnh của cô, và cũng là tâm điểm nghiên cứu suốt đời của cô.
descriptionLocalized.id: Baizhi adalah seorang peneliti di Ekokustik Sisa.Keinginan Baizhi yang dulunya tak terpenuhi kini telah menjadi kenyataan sebagai teman setianya. Makhluk Sisa You'tan adalah sumber kekuatan penyembuhannya, dan fokus penelitian seumur hidupnya.
descriptionLocalized.th: ไบจือ เป็นนักวิจัยด้านนิเวศวิทยาเสียงใน Remnantความปรารถนาที่ครั้งหนึ่งไม่สำเร็จของไบจือได้กลายเป็นเพื่อนคู่ใจของเธอแล้ว สัตว์ประหลาดจาก Remnant คุณตัน เป็นแหล่งที่มาของพลังรักษาของเธอ และเป็นหัวข้อการวิจัยตลอดชีวิตของเธอ

quote: No, I cannot place my faith in it, but my anticipation stems precisely from this distrust. A claim is always verifiable before it is discredited entirely.

quoteLocalized.vi: Không, tôi không thể đặt niềm tin vào nó, nhưng sự háo hức của tôi xuất phát chính từ sự ngờ vực này. Một lời khẳng định luôn có thể được xác minh trước khi nó bị bác bỏ hoàn toàn.
quoteLocalized.id: Tidak, aku tidak bisa mempercayainya, tetapi antisipasiku berasal dari ketidakpercayaan ini. Klaim selalu dapat diverifikasi sebelum benar-benar didiskreditkan.
quoteLocalized.th: Tidak, aku tidak bisa menaruh kepercayaanku padanya, tapi antisipasi ku muncul justru dari ketidakpercayaan ini. Klaim selalu dapat diverifikasi sebelum sepenuhnya didiskreditkan.

resonanceChain.name: Complex Simplicity
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Skill Emergency Plan additionally restores {1} Resonance Energy for every {0} "Concentration" consumed.

resonanceChain.name: Silent Tundra
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Skill Emergency Plan increases Baizhi's Glacio DMG Bonus by {1} and her Healing by {2} if she has {0} "Concentration". These effects last for {3}s.

resonanceChain.name: Veritas Lux Mea
resonanceChain.description: Intro Skill Overflowing Frost increases Baizhi's Max HP by {0} for {1}s.

resonanceChain.name: Eternal Verity
A Wish Answered
resonanceChain.description: If a team member is downed when Baizhi is alive on the team, immediately revive them and restore their HP to {0} of their Max HP. This effect can be triggered once every {1} minute(s).

resonanceChain.name: Seeker's Devotion
resonanceChain.description: When Euphonia is picked up, increase the Glacio DMG Bonus of all characters nearby by {0} for {1}s.

skills.name: Destined Promise
skills.description: Basic Attack Baizhi instructs You'tan to perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG. Heavy Attack Baizhi continuously consumes STA to command You'tan to attack enemies, dealing Glacio DMG. During Heavy Attack, Baizhi can command You'tan to move. Mid-air Attack Baizhi consumes STA and summons You’tan in mid-air to perform a Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG. Dodge Counter Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

skills.name: Emergency Plan
skills.description: Baizhi calls You'tan to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG while immediately healing all characters on nearby teams.

skills.name: Momentary Union
skills.description: Baizhi summons You'tan to heal all characters on nearby teams, generating 4 stacks of Remnant Entities. Remnant Entities Remnant Entities follow the active team members. 1 stacks of Remnant Entities are automatically consumed to attack the targets every 2.5s, dealing Glacio DMG on hit while healing the active character on a nearby team.

skills.name: Harmonic Range
skills.description: When Baizhi casts Resonance Skill Emergency Plan, You'tan generates a field of Euphonia that lasts for 15s. Euphonia ATK of the Resonators who picks up Euphonia is increased by 15% for 20s.

skills.name: Stimulus Feedback
skills.description: Baizhi's Heavy Attack on hit heals the character with the lowest HP on a nearby team by 0.25% of her Max HP.

skills.name: Overflowing Frost
skills.description: Baizhi calls You'tan to perform 1 plunging attack, dealing Glacio DMG while healing all characters on a nearby team.

skills.name: Cycle of Life
skills.description: You'tan A Remnant Creature that answers to Baizhi’s mind and desires while sharing all her stats. You’tan goes back to Baizhi when Baizhi dodges. Concentration Baizhi consumes all "Concentrations" when casting Heavy Attack or Resonance Skill Emergency Plan to continuously heal all characters on nearby teams. Each 1 "Concentration" consumed provides 1 healing. The healings happen every 2s. When Baizhi consumes "Concentration" to cast Heavy Attack, Baizhi additionally restores Concerto Energy and Resonance Energy; When Baizhi consumes "Concentration" to cast Resonance Skill Emergency Plan, Baizhi additionally restores Concerto Energy. Forte Gauge: Concentration Baizhi can hold up to 4 "Concentrations". Baizhi obtains 1 "Concentration" for every Basic Attack on hit.

skills.name: Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking
